subject: Science

overview.description: Integrated science curriculum that explores scientific principles through Islamic perspectives, connecting Quranic wisdom with scientific discovery, and emphasizing ethical scientific practice guided by Islamic values

learning_objectives: Understand scientific principles with Islamic philosophical foundation
Connect Quranic descriptions of natural phenomena with scientific discoveries
Apply Islamic ethics and values to scientific research and applications
Develop scientific inquiry skills guided by Islamic principles
Integrate scientific knowledge with Islamic worldview and spiritual understanding

units.title: Quranic Descriptions of Natural Phenomena and Scientific Discovery
learning_outcomes: Understand Quranic verses describing natural phenomena
Connect Quranic descriptions with modern scientific understanding
Develop appreciation for scientific discovery as exploration of divine creation
Apply Islamic principles to scientific observation and inquiry

lessons.title: Quranic Cosmology and Modern Astronomy
objectives: Study Quranic verses describing the creation and structure of the universe
Compare Quranic descriptions with modern astronomical discoveries
Understand the Big Bang theory in relation to Quranic cosmology

activities.description: Study and analyze Quranic verses describing cosmic creation and structure
Observe and study celestial objects using telescopes and astronomical tools
Compare Quranic descriptions with modern astronomical theories
Reflect on the spiritual significance of cosmic exploration

cross_curricular_connections: Quran Studies: Scientific verses and interpretation

units.title: Life Sciences and Quranic Biology
learning_outcomes: Study biological processes described in the Quran
Understand Islamic principles of life, creation, and biodiversity
Apply Islamic ethics to biological research and biotechnology
Develop appreciation for biological complexity as divine design

lessons.title: Embryology and Human Development in Quranic and Scientific Perspective
objectives: Study Quranic descriptions of human embryological development
Understand modern embryology and developmental biology
Analyze the accuracy and wisdom of Quranic embryological descriptions

activities.description: Study Quranic verses describing human embryological stages
Study modern embryology using models, images, and microscopy
Create comparative timeline of Quranic and scientific descriptions
Discuss Islamic bioethics in embryology and reproductive technology

cross_curricular_connections: Quran Studies: Quranic descriptions of creation
Islamic Science: Islamic medical and biological traditions

units.title: Environmental Science and Islamic Stewardship
learning_outcomes: Understand Islamic principles of environmental stewardship (Khilafah)
Apply Islamic ethics to environmental conservation and sustainability
Study environmental problems from Islamic perspective
Develop practical solutions based on Islamic environmental principles

lessons.title: Islamic Environmental Ethics and Sustainable Development
objectives: Understand Islamic principles of environmental stewardship
Apply Islamic environmental ethics to current environmental challenges
Develop sustainable solutions based on Islamic principles

activities.description: Study Quranic and Hadith principles of environmental stewardship
Assess local environmental issues and challenges
Develop sustainable solutions based on Islamic environmental principles

cross_curricular_connections: Quran Studies: Environmental stewardship in Islam
Geography: Environmental systems and human impact

units.title: Physics and the Signs of Allah in Natural Laws
learning_outcomes: Understand physical laws as manifestations of divine order
Study Quranic references to physical phenomena
Apply Islamic perspective to modern physics concepts
Develop appreciation for the precision and beauty of natural laws

lessons.title: Light, Energy, and Quranic References to Divine Light
objectives: Understand the physics of light and electromagnetic radiation
Study Quranic metaphors and references involving light
Connect physical and spiritual concepts of light and energy

activities.description: Conduct experiments on light properties, reflection, refraction, and diffraction
Study Quranic verses and metaphors involving light and illumination
Analyze connections between physical light and spiritual enlightenment
Reflect on the integration of physical and spiritual understanding

resources: Quranic verses on light and illumination
Islamic spiritual texts on divine light
cross_curricular_connections: Quran Studies: Light metaphors and spiritual illumination
Islamic Science: Historical Islamic contributions to optics

quranic_science_investigations: Study of natural phenomena described in Quranic verses
Comparative analysis of Quranic descriptions and scientific discoveries
Environmental stewardship projects based on Islamic principles
Astronomical observations connecting to Quranic cosmology
ethical_science_projects: Environmental conservation projects guided by Islamic principles
Technology assessment from Islamic ethical perspectives
Community science education with Islamic integration
integrated_research: Independent research projects connecting Islamic texts with scientific topics
Historical study of Muslim scientists and their methodologies
Contemporary applications of Islamic scientific ethics
Interdisciplinary projects integrating multiple Islamic and scientific perspectives

formative_assessments: Weekly reflection journals on Islamic-scientific connections
Quranic verse analysis and scientific correlation exercises
Ethical case study discussions and analyses
Laboratory reports with Islamic ethical considerations
summative_assessments: Integrated examinations covering both Islamic and scientific content (40%)
Environmental stewardship project with Islamic foundation (20%)

islamic_scientific_texts: Quran with scientific commentary and interpretation
Hadith collections relevant to science and natural phenomena
Islamic environmental ethics and stewardship texts
Contemporary Islamic perspectives on science and technology
laboratory_equipment: Standard science laboratory equipment for experiments
digital_resources: Islamic scientific databases and online libraries
Quranic search tools for scientific verses

career_connections: Science education with cultural and religious integration
Research in Islam and science interdisciplinary studies

spiritual_integration.scientific_worship: Understanding scientific study as a form of worship and reflection
spiritual_integration.divine_signs: Recognition of natural phenomena as signs (ayat) of divine creation
spiritual_integration.ethical_responsibility: Application of Islamic ethical principles to scientific practice
spiritual_integration.stewardship_duty: Fulfillment of human responsibility as stewards (khalifah) of creation
spiritual_integration.holistic_understanding: Integration of spiritual, ethical, and scientific dimensions of knowledge
